abstract: Rory McIlroy withdraws from British Open golf tournament because of sprained ankle.
lead_paragraph: McIlroy, who is ranked No. 1, announced that a left ankle injury would keep him from defending his British Open title at St. Andrews next week.

headline.main: Rory McIlroy Pulls Out of British Open With Ankle Injury
headline.print_headline: Hobbled McIlroy Decides Not to Defend Open Title

snippet: McIlroy, who is ranked No. 1, announced that a left ankle injury would keep him from defending his British Open title at St. Andrews next week.
